(:action obtain ; Obtain a resource and update task status
  :parameters (?p - person ?resource - object ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (available ?resource ?loc) (can_obtain ?p ?resource))
  :effect (and (not (available ?resource ?loc))

(:action pour ;  Perform actions related to pouring and cleaning up
  :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?target - target ?loc - location ?cleaning_tool - cleaning_tool)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) 
                     (at ?target ?loc) 
                     (inventory ?p ?item) 
                     (or (sealed ?item) 
                         (and (wet ?target) (sticky ?target) (inventory ?p ?cleaning_tool))))
  :effect (and (when (sealed ?item) 
                  (and (not (sealed ?item))
